pluginstrument.author: enjxp_SimPassion
pluginstrument.description: This is CAPT EFIS instrument i've reworked, starting on Russ Barlow EFIS for x737, to fit the behavior and manage original EFIS in ZiboMod B737-800X It uses initial Graphics Background and global lightning Panels designed by AudioBirdXP, thanks to its kind agreement I've added my own designed dials and buttons
